bibl.title: Pistoi dia tèn technèn. Bankers, Loans and Archives in the Ancient World. Studies in Honour of Raymond Bogaert. (Studia Hellenistica. 44.)
bibl.note: 19 contributions. - I. The Ancient Near East. - II. The Greek World. - III. Graeco-Roman Egypt. - IV. The Roman World. - Bibliography. Indexes.
bibl.seg: VERBOVEN Koenraad, Katelijn VANDORPE and Véronique CHANKOWSKI, Pistoi dia tèn technèn. Bankers, Loans and Archives in the Ancient World. Studies in Honour of Raymond Bogaert. (Studia Hellenistica. 44.)
